entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rocky Mountain House 3:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
